Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Cannibalism \Can"ni*bal*ism\, n. [Cf. F. cannibalisme.] The act or practice of eating human flesh by mankind. Hence; Murderous cruelty; barbarity. --Berke. [1913 Webster]
cannibalism n : the practice of eating the flesh of your own kind
